titleStmt.title: declaration of uninundated land
titleStmt.author: Isis, daughter of Sarapion, and her brothers

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "To Ptolemaios, royal secretary of the meris of Themistes, from Isis, daughter of Sarapion, and her brothers, acting through Ischyrion, their agent. There belong to us near the village of Pelousion, out of the 5 arouras registered for taxation in the name of Soteris, daughter of Sambas, 1 1/5 arouras of catoecic land, and 1/48 arouras of epibole, equal 1 1/5 1/48 arouras, which we declare, in accordance with the orders issued, as unwatered in the current 4th year of Antoninus and Verus, the lords Augusi. Wherefore we present this declaration . . ."

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC-Youtie LC, ZPE 33, 194-6, 1979, Pl IXc -- SB XVI 12561
